definition: a person of short stature/a short person
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: Like all the short guys would become receivers, right?
sentences.chinese: 就象讓所有矮個兒都當外接手，對吧？

sentences.english: Other things are equal, a tall man is more respected than a short man.
sentences.chinese: 其他的條件相同的話，高個兒比矮個兒更受人尊重。

sentences.english: Like wisl the short guys would indeed become receivers: right?
sentences.chinese: 就象讓全面矮個兒都當外接手，對吧？
